name: Miner Tycoon: Big Dynamite
description:
Blow Up, collect, sell and get rich!

Explore and find unique gems while bombing your way through an interactive environment. Expose all your riches in a museum and earn big money from visitors.

Craft beautiful jewelry and complete tasks and missions to earn even more money.

Build up a mansion and have a fun time with all your money!
publishers: BREW OYUN YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
